value.title: Sharing and Collaboration in Power BI
value.excerpt: Adam looks at the different sharing and collaboration items within Power BI. From the share button to apps and embedding options. Power BI offers many options.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton -- http://twitter.com/patrickdba -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube

value.title: Start your Power BI journey with Guy in a Cube
value.excerpt: Want to learn Power BI from the masters?   Coming from Microsoft Excel and not sure where to start? Or, maybe you've used Power BI but want to make sure you are doing the right thing. Guy in a Cube has a course for you!  Power BI Blueprint: A step-by-step guide to creating report with Power BI.  https://guyinacu.be/courses

value.excerpt: Patrick shows you how easy it is to use Microsoft Flow to take Power BI data alerts to the next level. Use Microsoft Flow to send to additional people. value.title: Test your Power BI DAX measures in DAX Studio
value.excerpt: Learn how to get your DAX measures in working order, using DAX Studio, before putting them in your Power BI report. Patrick walks you through it! value.title: The BANANAS approach to use Power BI Bookmarks to swap tooltips
value.excerpt: Have you wanted to change the Power BI tooltips dynamically? This BANANAS trick allows you to at least switch the content of a report page tooltip to give you more flexibility and take your report to the next level!  Download Sample: http://guyinacu.be/swaptooltipsample  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: The Power BI Smart Narrative visual is INSANE AMAZING!
value.excerpt: The smart narrative visual can help tell the story in your Power BI report. Justyna Lucznik joins us to explore the visual and to illustrate how you can generate text about your data.  Make sure you have the September 2020 version of Power BI Desktop, or later.  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/visuals/power-bi-visualization-smart-narrative

value.title: Tracing with Log Analytics and Power BI
value.excerpt: With Log Analytics integration in Power BI, you can now capture Analysis Services trace events easily and over a longer period of time. Combined with the Power BI template report, you can gain a lot of insights into usage of your datasets. With more to come down the road!  Announcing long-term usage

value.title: What is a Power BI tenant? (Office 365 / Azure Active Directory)

value.title: Why and how to use data protection in Power BI
value.excerpt: Data protection in Power BI can help you to prevent data leakage and have confidence in your data approach. Data Protection documentation overview https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/admin/service-security-data-protection-overview

value.title: DAX Measures: Filter Context Explained in Simple Terms using the I.C.A.N. Principle
value.excerpt: For Power BI DAX Measures, one of the hardest concepts to grasp is the Filter Context. Or is it? I explain the “Filter Context” using the 4-easy step approach of the I.C.A.N. Principle. ==  I. Incoming Filters ==  C. CALCULATE does it’s Magic! ==  A. Apply relationships (filters flow Across relationships)
